content:
Hi. Looking for help:
I was going to do a commit but since I saw other commits coming in i decided to wait a bit, so I cancelled my commit in Tortoise.
Now when I go there again, Tortoise does not show those files for me to commit - i would think they are not committed yet, so why don't they show in my SVN client? I do a "check for modifications" and these files don't show as modified.
Any way I can fix this?
can you see the files on the file system?

i added one resource deviceDefinition, and i changed the translations, fhir.ini, compartments...
all of those changes are here
got it running by restarting my machine.
